nodes.text: A Kowakian monkey-lizard resided on the planet of Zygerria during the time of the Clone Wars.

Around 21 BBY, when Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi along with Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, padawan Ahsoka Tano and clone trooper captain Rex arrived on the planet to infiltrate the Zygerrian slave empire, this Kowakian monkey-lizard was present in a slave market, dueling with a Momong with miniature swords.
